docs.lead_paragraph: Freshmen at Florida's Lakewood High School lined up against gold and black gymnasium mats on Friday to have their height and weight measured, an assessment to launch a novel study on fighting teenage obesity with trendy new technology.

headline.main: Obesity Research Takes High-Tech Twist at Florida School
headline.print_headline: Obesity Research Takes High-Tech Twist at Florida School

docs.snippet: Freshmen at Florida's Lakewood High School lined up against gold and black gymnasium mats on Friday to have their height and weight measured, an assessment to launch a novel study on fighting teenage obesity with trendy new technology.

docs.lead_paragraph: The bride is a candidate for a master’s degree at Columbia University Teachers College. The groom is a vice president for MediaLink in New York.

docs.lead_paragraph: Austria's youthful foreign minister began his address to the U.N. General Assembly on Saturday by acknowledging his place in the world and offering something rarely seen during the annual meeting of world leaders.

headline.main: Why Government Websites Are Terrible and How to Fix Them

docs.abstract: By exposing how confusing food stamp applications and other government online services can be, Citizen Onboard hopes to make them better.

headline.main: Finding Humane Care at the End of Life

docs.abstract: What can be done to insure that the elderly get the care they want and need, particularly in their dying days?

docs.lead_paragraph: A mentally ill North Carolina inmate died from dehydration during a prison transfer last spring, according to an autopsy report released on Thursday about an incident that led to several prison employees losing their jobs.

headline.main: Mentally Ill North Carolina Prisoner Died of Dehydration During Transfer
headline.print_headline: Mentally Ill North Carolina Prisoner Died of Dehydration During Transfer

docs.snippet: A mentally ill North Carolina inmate died from dehydration during a prison transfer last spring, according to an autopsy report released on Thursday about an incident that led to several prison employees losing their jobs.

docs.lead_paragraph: A North Carolina inmate with mental illness who had been held in solitary confinement died of thirst, according to an autopsy report released Thursday.

headline.main: Autopsy: Mentally Ill NC Inmate Died of Thirst
headline.print_headline: Autopsy: Mentally Ill NC Inmate Died of Thirst

docs.snippet: A North Carolina inmate with mental illness who had been held in solitary confinement died of thirst, according to an autopsy report released Thursday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Transformational festivals emerge as a petri dish for art and culture in America.

headline.seo: Burning Man Spawns New Age Festivals

docs.abstract: New type of gathering known as 'transformational festivals,' inspired by Nevada's Burning Man festival, purport to offer convergence of art, nature, spirituality and community; such festivals have spread beyond West Coast and take place year-round throughout United States.
docs.snippet: Transformational festivals emerge as a petri dish for art and culture in America.

docs.lead_paragraph: Homicide charges have been dismissed — at least temporarily — against a couple accused of killing the woman's severely disabled daughter by withholding food and medical care.

headline.main: Charges Tossed in Death of Disabled New York Girl
headline.print_headline: Charges Tossed in Death of Disabled New York Girl

docs.snippet: Homicide charges have been dismissed — at least temporarily — against a couple accused of killing the woman's severely disabled daughter by withholding food and medical care.
